weWillAddYourName.message: We will add your name to the author list.

ableToSeePrereviewShortly.message: You’ll be able to see your name on the PREreview shortly.

closeWindowOrSeePrereview.message: You can close this window, or <link>see the PREreview</link>.

asYouHaveAlreadyStartedWeWillTakeYouToTh.message: As you’ve already started, we’ll take you to the next step so you can carry on.

unableToAddYourNameWorkHasBeenSaved.message: We were unable to add your name to the PREreview. We saved your work.

comeBackLater.message: Please try again later by coming back to this page.

getInTouch.message: If this problem persists, please <link>get in touch</link>.
